section.title: Requirements
section.p: A version of the Eclipse platform later than 2.1 RC2 is needed.

section.title: Installation
section.p: Connect to the Cactus update site (available soon) from Eclipse to install both plug-ins at once as an Eclipse feature.

section.title: Configuration
section.p: The plug-ins are functional 'off the shelf'. Refer to the corresponding plug-in section for specific configuration.
